channel.title: Shaving Bea Arthur's Zombie Show w/ Alan & ?
channel.description: From the creators of "The Shaving Bea Arthur Show" and the award winning radio drama "The Trailer Park" comes the reanimated version of the original. Tune in for whatever comes up. Bea there!!!!
